title: BRIEF-Pembina Pipeline Corporation Announces $1.5 BLN Public Note Offering
text:
BRIEF-Pembina Pipeline Corporation Announces $1.5 BLN Public Note Offering

Stock Markets 57 minutes ago (Sep 09, 2019 18:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Pembina Pipeline Corporation Announces $1.5 BLN Public Note Offering Sept 9 (Reuters) - Pembina Pipeline Corp : * PEMBINA PIPELINE CORPORATION ANNOUNCES $1.5 BILLION PUBLIC NOTE OFFERING * PEMBINA PIPELINE CORP - OFFERING WILL BE CONDUCTED IN THREE TRANCHES CONSISTING OF $600 MILLION IN SENIOR UNSECURED MEDIUM-TERM NOTES * PEMBINA - PROCEEDS ARE INTENDED TO BE USED TO REPAY SHORT-TERM INDEBTEDNESS OF CO UNDER ITS UNSECURED $1.0 BILLION NON-REVOLVING TERM LOAN DUE MARCH 2021 * PEMBINA PIPELINE CORP - OFFERING IN THREE TRANCHES CONSISTS OF $300 MILLION PRINCIPAL AMOUNT THROUGH 4.54% MEDIUM-TERM NOTES
